backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing users, phone connection, coin balances, bank accounts, and transaction-based fund additions with validation and queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode variables for the UI theme.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating the Scan & Earn flow with section scrolling and conditional rendering after phone connection.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/AddFun: Modal for adding funds via GPay/BHIM, showing QR code, payment number, and transaction ID submission.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/CoinCo: Animated coin balance display using live backend balance and count‑up animation.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Hero.t: Displays a hero section with a background image, headline, coin counter, and a CTA button that triggers scanning.
Re-exports Scan & Earn components for easy importing.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/PhoneC: Handles phone number validation and connection workflow, showing either a form or a success state.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Reward: Shows reward tiers and lets users select one to see corresponding INR-to-coins rewards.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/ScanRe: Simulates a QR scan process with visual states for idle, scanning, and success.
frontend/src/components/scan-earn/Wallet: Manages displaying or adding a user's bank account and provides access to an add-funds modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUp.ts: Provides an animated count-up hook that eases values toward a target number.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user connection, balances, reward tiers, bank accounts, and fund additions, with mutations that invalidate relevant queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables and utilities for dark-mode glassmorphism, color tokens, and glow effects.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting INR values, coin numbers, and normalizing or validating Indian phone numbers.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a `cn` helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up ReactDOM, React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/state/flowStore.ts: Zustand store managing flow state like phone connection, selected reward tier, and flow resets.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors via CSS variables, extended theme settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the fintech app’s goals, features, architecture notes, and image requirements.
